channel.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
channel.description:
I [i]think[/i] I know how to add a portal,(Check NPC List for the id and put in autospawn.cfg) But how do i change the place they tele to? I've just finished my NPC Training area and i want a portal rather than a command to get you there.
[b]Thanks In Advance.

item.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i bet theres gonna be errors unless someone acually put a switch statment in case 132.put

Case 4152:
teleportToX = Xcoord;
teleportToY = Ycoord;
sendMessage("Message");
break;

under

switch(objectID) {

if you dont have it then add this

switch(objectID) {

}

and add it under switch(objectID) {

add this

Case 4152:
teleportToX = Xcoord;
teleportToY = Ycoord;
sendMessage("Message");
break;

hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Use mine, It takes up less space.

Case 4152: teleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord; sendMessage("Message"); break;
It also contains the portal Id .

Read full topic

NVM I have one.

item.source: Yeah i know this is nooby

item.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

'rich.
Not Really.
break; marks the end of the code.
Why have a closing Brace }
Not tried, but probably causes errors.

Also.
heightLevel = 0;
is pointless. The server automatically assumes its 0. So unless you want it to be 1 , you done need it.

Read full topic
item.source: Yeah i know this is nooby

item.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Oh well, either works fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Yeah i know this is nooby

item.title: Yeah i know this is nooby
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:170485"]In case 132 add this:

if (objectID == portalid) { // Portal resetPos(); teleportToX = xcoord; teleportToY = ycoord; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Message"); break; }[/quote]
That just consumes more space.

Add this :

Case PortalID: teleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord; sendMessage("Message"); break;

Just search “Case” then under the end of the code ( break; ) , Add what i told you too.

EDIT : It may not look like more, but you should always use the smaller code. In the end it adds up.

Read full topic
